price: A e quan mirësi atë që më bëre mua, ndërkohë që bijtë e Israilit (popullin tim) i bëre skllevër”?
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ نِعۡمَةٞ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَيَّ أَنۡ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka niʿ'matun tamunnuhā ʿalayya an ʿabbadtta banī is'rāīla
